info.summery: Turnstiles are used for restricting passages so that only one person may pass at a time helping to limit the flow of people past a point. They provide a secure barrier for entry allowing easier management and control of people entering and exiting a secured area.
info.generalInfo: Standard Sizing as follows: 2m Height, 1.5m Length 1.5m, Width. In case of power failure, turnstiles will operate freely to allow quick escape in case of emergency. Turnstile is supplied on a steel base but can be mounted to suitable flooring if required.
info.finish: Our standard turnstiles are galvanised steel with a choice of powder coats if required.
info.additions: You can add a coin, ticket/pass system allowing access for paying customers or fobbed entry to employees, the turnstile can be tailored to your requirements. A canopy can be added for additional security to stop anyone climbing over the turnstile.
info.applications: Turnstiles can be used in a variety of locations such as the following. Stadiums, office buildings, festivals, events, factories, schools and construction site.

info.summery: Telescopic gates are ideal for achieving protection of a large opening where the run back is restricted, this can be made with up of a maximum of three gate leaves, allowing for run back to be reduced by up to 75%, compared to a single leaf gate.
info.generalInfo: Height: 1m – 2.4m & Length: 3m – 12m & Width: Varies (dependent on amount of gate leaves required)
info.finish: We can provide a variety of finishes. We recommend with all mild steel gates a galvanised protection with a powder coated finish. The infill (the space inside the gate frame) can be filled with the following Security mesh, wooden planks steel bars, aluminium planks. Additional options can be discussed.
info.applications: These gates are ideal to secure a commercial or residential properties, ideal for offices, car parks, commercial estates, factories and other areas where large opening are required.

info.summery: Automated sliding gates provide a secure access barrier to your property, a simple but effective tacked sliding gate can be located; normally at vehicle access locations to control who is entering and exiting the property. The operation of the gate can be tailored to your requirements.
info.finish: We can provide a variety of finishes. We recommend with all mild steel gates a galvanised protection with a powder coated finish. The infill (the space inside the gate frame) can be filled with the following Security mesh, wooden planks steel bars, aluminium planks. Additional options can be discussed.
info.applications: These gates are ideal to secure a residential or commercial properties, ideal for offices, car parks, commercial estates, factories.

info.summery:
Our Swing – Height restrictors are versatile making them ideal for use in unmanned areas with low volume traffic and enable the control of vehicles height entering your car park. This is a cost-effective alternative to fully automated barriers or a gate entry system where they are not necessary. 
Test
info.finish: Our standard turnstiles are galvanised steel with a choice of powder coats if required.
info.applications: Carparks, factories, Stores and Shopping centres, Holiday resorts.

info.summery: Cantilever gates are ideal for achieving protection of a large openings where the run back is available, it is also ideal for areas where the finished floor is uneven or sloping. The gate cantilevers/floats above the opening as it moves.
info.finish: We can provide a variety of finishes. We recommend with all mild steel gates a galvanised protection with a powder coated finish. The infill (the space inside the gate frame) can be filled with the following Security mesh, wooden planks steel bars, aluminium planks. Additional options can be discussed.
info.applications: These gates are ideal to secure a residential or commercial properties, ideal for offices, car parks, commercial estates, factories.

info.summery: Security Gates are great solution when you are trying to secure your property or business and stop any unauthorised access. We offer a wide range of designs to from palisade or meshed infill to keyed or padlocked security locks and offering pedestrian access gates right through to vehicle entrance gates. We offer design manufacture and install options, with both a manual or automated solutions available.
info.generalInfo: Security Gates, Sizes 0.75m – 8m Wide by 1.8m to 2.8m High
info.finish: Galvanised, Powder coated as standard but we can offer other finishes at request.
info.applications: Residential Properties, Commercial Properties, Carparks & Factories, Please call 0121 725 1631 to book your free site survey today.

info.summery: This product is a great way to stop vehicles over a desired height entering a car park, whilst still allowing lower level vehicles entry.
info.generalInfo: Size 2m-6m long (As standard) and height 2m/ 2.1m/ 2.4m (As standard)
info.finish: Available in RAL 3020 Red, RAL 1023 Yellow as standard, with other colours available upon request.
info.applications: Carparks, factories, Stores and Shopping centres, Holiday resorts.

info.summery: Parking barriers stop all vehicles accessing the site with a cost effective manual solution.
info.generalInfo: Single sizes 2-5m (As standard) and double sizes 4-9m (As standard)
info.finish: Available in RAL 3020 Red, RAL 1023 Yellow as standard, with other colours available upon request
info.applications: Carparks, factories, Stores and Shopping centres, Holiday resorts.
